description: Long days high in the mountains require strong resolve and adaptable clothing. The Alpinist is an all-around performance shirt that maintains a warm core on cold days and keeps you cool when things get heated. Moisture-wicking properties achieve this balance, making the Alpinist compatible with quickly shifting climates like those of Ben Nevis, where the wind howls fierce and the soul finds solace.
name: Roark Alpinist Woven - Mens
